body_html:
maybe I should repeat my question in an another way.

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/51123502/what-different-between-sess-run-two-times-or-one-time-with-tf-control-dependenci

I want to use tensorflow to solve ode with RK23 or RK45 method, the ode is
$$ \dot{\boldsymbol{\theta}} = - \nabla_{\boldsymbol{\theta}} L(\boldsymbol{\theta}) $$
(eq(4) in https://kexue.fm/archives/5655#GD%E4%B8%8EODE )

so I need autograd. At echo steps of RK method, I need to get gradients at different point at least twice.

body:
maybe I should repeat my question in an another way.

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/51123502/what-different-between-sess-run-two-times-or-one-time-with-tf-control-dependenci

I want to use tensorflow to solve ode with RK23 or RK45 method, the ode is
$$ \dot{\boldsymbol{\theta}} = - \nabla_{\boldsymbol{\theta}} L(\boldsymbol{\theta}) $$
(eq(4) in https://kexue.fm/archives/5655#GD%E4%B8%8EODE )

so I need autograd. At echo steps of RK method, I need to get gradients at different point at least twice.
